body:
I am experiencing the same issue but not with a non-exiting key. 

I get it using `gcloud.pubsub` and setting  `credentials` with  `client_email` and `private_key` after just a couple of seconds sending data.

```
Auth error: { [Error: socket hang up] code: 'ECONNRESET' }
XXX/node_modules/gcloud/node_modules/grpc/src/node/src/credentials.js:108
      callback(code, message, metadata._getCoreRepresentation());
      ^
TypeError: The callback's first argument must be a status code
  at TypeError (native)
  at XXX/node_modules/gcloud/node_modules/grpc/src/node/src/credentials.js:108:7
  at XXX/node_modules/gcloud/node_modules/grpc/src/node/src/credentials.js:124:9
  at XXX/node_modules/gcloud/node_modules/google-auto-auth/node_modules/google-auth-library/l…
  at XXX/node_modules/gcloud/node_modules/google-auto-auth/node_modules/google-auth-library/l…
  at Request._callback (XXX/node_modules/gcloud/node_modules/google-auto-auth/node_modules/go…
  at self.callback (XXX/node_modules/gcloud/node_modules/google-auto-auth/node_modules/google…
  at Request.emit (events.js:107:17)
  at Request.onRequestError (XXX/node_modules/gcloud/node_modules/google-auto-auth/node_modul…
  at ClientRequest.emit (events.js:107:17)
  at TLSSocket.socketOnEnd (_http_client.js:293:9)
  at TLSSocket.emit (events.js:129:20)
  at _stream_readable.js:908:16
  at process._tickCallback (node.js:355:11)
```
This should now be fixed in gRPC version `1.0.0-pre2`
